A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The corny jokes kill a star seriously its right up there with spaceballs \,the villains take a half star \,another half star with a bunch of the other silly things \, I enjoyed the Force Awakens so much better\, story was more true to a star wars fan and the cinematography was shot like the classic trilogy . This was like a Micheal Bay film trying to cash in on the STAR WARS name instead of creating a story that would continue the tradition of how influential this movie was and is involved in peoples every day lives. Rental but not a Classic
